comments.en:
This is basically the same printer as the DeskJet 970Cse, except it has ports on the side for inserting SmartMedia and CompactFlash digital "film" and has an LCD panel that lets you select pictures from the "film" to print.

Up/downloading of photos between the PC and the printer/memory card work with the HPOJ low level drivers. You need also the modifed USB printer.c kernel module from the HPOJ web site, if you want to access your memory cards via USB.

The best output one gets with HP's HPIJS with the patches from Matthias Bunte and Richard Spencer-Smith ("hpijs-rss"). The GIMP-Print driver also works (Model setting: "pcl-900"), but only up to 600 dpi.

An optional duplex unit is available, but this does not work with GIMP-Print, use "hpijs-rss", "hpijs", "cdj970" or "pcl3" instead.
